broadwick.config

Class ConfigValidationErrors

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.config.ConfigValidationErrors

  • public final class ConfigValidationErrors
extends Object
    This class encapsulates errors found during the validation of configuration files.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Error status of the configuration status.
